name: CONFEDERATED TRIBES OF GRAND RONDE
description: Confederation of Native American tribes with historical ties to Western Oregon.
sampleDescriptions: Work with House and Senate on legislation related to the Confederated Tribes of the Grand Ronde, including forestry and hemp issues.
